channel.title: North American on ZooBerry
channel.description: Recent content in North American on ZooBerry

item.title: Coyote II
item.description: A Cute playful Coyote From the Deserts of North-America, they like to chase their tale, grooming themselves and drinking water. A great option for your zoos ES Required.

item.title: Northern River Otter
item.description: A cute North American otter for your zoo.

item.title: Raccoon
item.description: A cute raccoon for your zoo.

item.title: Red Fox III
item.description: A playful red fox with three variations.

item.title: Roosevelt Elk II
item.description: The largest elk species native to North America.

item.title: Spirit Bear
item.description: A unique white Black Bear from British Columbia.

item.title: Alaskan Timber Wolf
item.description: Alaskan Timber Wolf with four skins and realistic behavior coding.

item.title: American Badger II
item.description: A North American carnivore for grasslands.

item.title: American Crocodile
item.description: An endangered North American crocodile.

item.title: Arctic Wolf
item.description: An Arctic tundra wolf with color variations.

item.title: Black Bear II
item.description: A North American ursid with coat variations.

item.title: Kodiak Bear II
item.description: The largest bear species alive today.

item.title: North American Cougar
item.description: A handsome North American cougar to enhance your zoo.

item.title: Great Plains Wolf
item.description: The Great Plains Wolf with three color variations, as requested by Soop.

item.title: American Alligator
item.description: Simply an alligator. Thank you Zoo-Master for facts about alligators.

item.title: American Alligator (ES Version)
item.description: Includes 100% Endangered Species design with new features for the American Alligator.

item.title: Bobcat
item.description: A boreal cat native to North America.

item.title: Caribbean Flamingo (ES Version)
item.description: The Caribbean flamingos are brightest, showing their true colors of red, pink, or orange on their legs, bills, and faces. Includes 100% Endangered Species design.

item.title: Caribbean Flamingo
item.description: The brightest Caribbean flamingos, showing true red, pink, or orange colors on their legs, bills, and faces.

item.title: Kodiak Bear
item.description: The Kodiak bear is a recolored grizzly bear adapted to tundra environments.

item.title: Coyote
item.description: A smaller relative of the wolf, the adaptable coyote thrives in all biomes.

item.title: Prairie Dog
item.description: A small rodent that lives in the prairies of North America.

item.title: Roosevelt Elk
item.description: A Roosevelt Elk made by ShenTirag in 2006; originally released on Shen’s Den.

item.title: Desert Pack
item.description: This is part of a set of eight biome packs that were made by the Zoo Admin Design Team many years ago.

item.title: Grassland Pack
item.description: This is part of a set of eight biome packs that were made by the Zoo Admin Design Team many years ago.

item.title: Scrub Pack
item.description: This is part of a set of eight biome packs that were made by the Zoo Admin Design Team many years ago.

item.title: American Badger
item.description: A white dorsal stripe extends back over the head from the nose of the American badger.

item.title: Skunk
item.description: Skunks produce a very smelly spray that repels most predators. This oily, yellow liquid is produced in two glands located under the tail.

item.title: Eastern Cougar
item.description: Here is the Eastern Cougar. This cat is colored by August and coded by Penguinman! Enjoy!

item.title: Ornate Box Turtle
item.description: The ornate box turtle is one of two turtle species on the Great Plains that are terrestrial.

item.title: Black Bear
item.description: The North American black bear is the best known and most widespread of the North American bears.

item.title: Red Wolf
item.description: A wolf made by Radar and koala komander.

item.title: Dall Sheep
item.description: First animal Ive ever made

item.title: Long-Tailed Weasel
item.description: This is a North American weasel for ZT2. It contains 2 variants (not shown) - white and brown with light facial markings.

item.title: Mexican Wolf
item.description: The Mexican Wolf is a sub-species of the Gray Wolf.
